de.dosmike.sponge.megamenus.api.elements.concepts

Interface IPressable<X extends IPressable>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MButton, MCheckbox, MSpinner

    public interface IPressable<X extends IPressable>
    Interface to be implemented by IElements that shall react to keys being pressed. It might be important to note, that this feature will only work in GUI-Menus

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IPressable.Buttons 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fireKeyEvent(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer, IPressable.Buttons key, boolean ctrl)
      This method will be called by the MenuRenderer when a button is pressed, hovering this element.
      OnKeyListener<X> getOnKeyListener()
      Return the current OnKeyListener associated with this element that will be used whenever fireKeyEvent is invoked.
      void setOnKeyListener(OnKeyListener<X> listener)
      Replace the current OnKeyListener with the specified one.

    • Method Detail

      • setOnKeyListener

        void setOnKeyListener(OnKeyListener<X> listener)
        Replace the current OnKeyListener with the specified one.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener that shall react to keys being pressed with this IElement.

      • getOnKeyListener

        OnKeyListener<X> getOnKeyListener()
        Return the current OnKeyListener associated with this element that will be used whenever fireKeyEvent is invoked.
        Returns:
        The current OnKeyListener, or null if no listener was set.

      • fireKeyEvent

        void fireKeyEvent(org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player viewer,
                  IPressable.Buttons key,
                  boolean ctrl)
        This method will be called by the MenuRenderer when a button is pressed, hovering this element.
        Parameters:
        viewer - the Player instance that pressed a key over this element in the assigned renderer.
        key - an enum value from IPressable.Buttons representing one of the view detectable keys.
        ctrl - true if the player held the ctrl-modifier key while pressing buttons for applicable keys.
